column2: Your [Root.job_treasurer.GetJobTitle] has returned from his studies into cartography and is at your disposal again.

column1: # PONDER CARTOGRAPHY - EVENT FROM PLAYER DECISION ON SELF:

column2: Your [Root.job_treasurer.GetJobTitle] can produce a new map of the known world, but you must first select a category.
Choose a map from the "Geography and Climate" subcategory.
Choose a map from the "Province Settlements" subcategory.
Choose a map from the "Health and Wellbeing" subcategory.
Select a subcategory within "Vassals, Realms, and Regions"
Choose a map from the "Direct Vassals" subcategory.
Choose a map from the "Independent Realms" subcategory.
Relative Power as a Defender (Including Allies)
Relative Power as an Attacker (Including Allies)
Choose a map from the "Regions and Control" subcategory.
Provinces Not Completely Controlled by Top Liege
Provinces Not Completely Controlled by Local Count
Select a subcategory within "Places of Power and Corruption"
Fires an event that allows you to decide which "Fake Map Mode" you want to see displayed via the "Fabricate Map" job action of your [Root.job_treasurer.GetJobTitle].

Your [From.job_treasurer.GetJobTitle] will produce charts with useful information about the known world. To specify the nature of this map, you must decide first which information you want.\n(Use the decision "Ponder Cartography" on your player character to chose a map mode that this action will display.)
